creator: dims@yahoo.com
text:
The endorsed mechanism is broken in JDK1.4_002. See
http://developer.java.sun.com/developer/bugParade/bugs/4624775.html for a few
details. When we try to call XMLUtils.getOwnerDocument on the first node in
CanonicalizerBase's engineCanonicalizeXPathNodeSet, it fails because of problems
in Xalan's DTM implmentation (in the version shipped with JDK1.4). See enclosed
patch that checks the rest of the nodes in the set and picks the first valid
owner node. 

Thanks,
dims

Created attachment 6354
diff.txt against latest cvs
creator: dims@yahoo.com
dims@yahoo.com
text:
this has been checked in.

thanks,
dims
